notes: Seed entries are extracted from high-confidence recurring signals in listed resources.
Price ranges are operational seed ranges and should be refreshed with periodic market scans.
Glossary entries are marked needs_native_review for linguistic QA before production use.

items.title: Taxi: airport to Marrakech center
items.expected_cost_notes: Night-time or heavy luggage may move to top of range.
items.provenance_note: Derived from guide recommendations and community taxi-negotiation patterns.
inclusions_checklist: Confirm destination district (medina gate vs hotel door)

negotiation_scripts.english: How much is the ride to the center?

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Afak, bghit taman qbl ma n-rkb.
negotiation_scripts.english: Please, I want the price before getting in.

red_flags: Driver refuses to state fare or meter logic clearly
Price changes after arrival without prior agreement
what_to_do_instead: Use app-based taxi booking when available
Take another taxi with clear upfront pricing

items.title: Taxi: short intra-city ride
items.expected_cost_notes: Routes crossing dense medina edges may increase travel time.
items.provenance_note: Community and practical travel guidance signal for short urban transfers.
inclusions_checklist: Confirm whether fare is for whole car or per person

negotiation_scripts.english: That is a bit expensive, can you reduce it?
I want a fair price, please.

red_flags: Very high quote for short distance
No clarity on whether meter/app is used
what_to_do_instead: Walk to a busier street for another taxi

items.title: Hammam: local basic
items.expected_cost_notes: Range for basic local-style hammam experiences.
items.provenance_note: Activity marketplace and guide positioning for standard hammam options.

negotiation_scripts.english: What is included in this price?

red_flags: Unclear add-on fees announced only after treatment
what_to_do_instead: Choose providers with clear inclusions in writing

items.title: Hammam: tourist spa package
items.expected_cost_notes: Premium spas and bundled services can exceed this range.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Momkin n-shof l-pakaj kamel b taman nihai?
negotiation_scripts.english: Can I see the full package with final total price?

red_flags: No written package detail before payment
what_to_do_instead: Request itemized package or compare two providers

items.title: Agafay package: quad + camel + dinner show
items.expected_cost_notes: Typical listings; private or luxury variants are higher.
items.provenance_note: Aggregated from Airbnb/GetYourGuide/Viator/Klook listings observed on 2026-02-07.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Bghit n-3raf kolchi li dakhil f had taman.
negotiation_scripts.english: I want to know everything included in this price.

red_flags: Very low quote without clear inclusions
what_to_do_instead: Compare at least two operators with itemized inclusions

context_modifiers.label: Private group
context_modifiers.notes: Private transport and dedicated guide premium

items.title: Ourika Valley day trip
items.expected_cost_notes: Entry-level group trips can be cheap; private options cost more.

negotiation_scripts.english: Is lunch included in this price?

red_flags: Mandatory extras not declared up front
what_to_do_instead: Ask for final total including all extras

items.title: Hot air balloon flight with breakfast
items.expected_cost_notes: Premium operators and private baskets can be significantly higher.
items.provenance_note: Cross-platform listings and bestseller pages observed 2026-02-07.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Bghit taman nihai m3a transport w ftour.
negotiation_scripts.english: I want the final price including transport and breakfast.

what_to_do_instead: Book with clear cancellation and weather refund terms

items.title: Merzouga 3-day desert tour
items.expected_cost_notes: Luxury camps and private transport can exceed this range.
items.provenance_note: Aggregated from multiple booking marketplaces observed 2026-02-07.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Bghit tafasil dyal 3 lyam kamlin qbl l-khlas.
negotiation_scripts.english: I want full 3-day details before payment.

red_flags: High mandatory local add-ons not listed
what_to_do_instead: Compare at least two itineraries line-by-line

items.title: Private half-day city tour
items.expected_cost_notes: Group size and included monument entries change real total.
items.provenance_note: Viator private and group half-day city listings.

negotiation_scripts.english: Does this price include monument entry fees?

red_flags: Guide promises many stops in unrealistic time
what_to_do_instead: Ask for exact route and timings in writing

items.title: Mint tea in cafe/terrace
items.expected_cost_notes: Rooftop and premium venues can charge more.
items.provenance_note: Derived from food and terrace context in curated guides.
red_flags: No menu price shown in tourist-heavy terraces
what_to_do_instead: Ask menu price before ordering at rooftop venues

items.title: Street harira bowl
items.expected_cost_notes: Approximate range; verify locally due stall variation.
items.provenance_note: Food culture sources identify stall-based consumption patterns but not fixed prices.
what_to_do_instead: Check visible board or ask before serving

items.title: Souk: argan oil (small bottle)
items.expected_cost_notes: Large quality variance; authenticity claims are often inconsistent.
items.provenance_note: Souk and market guidance from editorial sources; range requires local verification loop.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Momkin taman akhor ila khdit juj?
negotiation_scripts.english: Can you give a better price if I take two?

red_flags: pressure sale with no quality details
what_to_do_instead: Compare two shops and confirm exact volume before paying

items.title: Souk: decorative lantern (mid-size)
items.expected_cost_notes: Handwork complexity and metal quality can increase costs substantially.
items.provenance_note: Souk bargaining category inferred from guidebook and city-guide themes.

negotiation_scripts.darija_latin: Hadchi zwin walakin taman tal3, nqass shwiya?
negotiation_scripts.english: It is nice but expensive, can you lower a bit?

red_flags: Very high opening quote with no quality explanation
what_to_do_instead: Walk and compare 3 shops before closing deal
